## Steps to reproduce

```powershell
Set-PSReadlineKeyHandler -Key Tab -Function MenuComplete
cd docu<TAB>
# menu completion open with element selected
<CTRL+C>
```

## Expected behavior

```none
menu completion is aborted
```

## Actual behavior

```none
entire shell/terminal freezes
```
